job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongREMOTE OPPORTUNITY  US ONLYstrongppbrppstrongAbout Wellory Diets dont work experts dostrongpp Wellory delivers 11 personalized nutrition coaching to help you build healthier habits and reach your goals for good Think of us like a therapist for your relationship with foodppbrppWere on a mission to make personalized nutrition accessible for alland we wont stop until we make an insane impact like drastically reducing the number of people who get sick every year from dietrelated disease Were grateful to be on this journey with some of the worlds best investors including Story Ventures Harlem Capital CoFounders of Tinder NBA Player Wayne Ellington Wellness guru Hannah Bronfman leaders from Glossier Google Amazon amongst others learn more hereppbrpp Were a remote team with a concentration in New York and San Francisco While we may be distant were all brandobsessed and looking for the next gogetter to join our family If you have what it takes to build the next biggest consumer tech company think world domination while wearing headtotoe Wellory gear wed love to meet youppbrppstrongWhat Were Looking Forstrongpp Wellory is seeking an ambitious passiondriven selfmotivated Software Engineer to join as the first inhouse hire on our growing engineer team Youll collaborate with engineers designers and product to deliver value to Wellorys growing user base of clients and nutrition coaches You must be comfortable in a fastpaced agile environment like really fast and able to wear both strategy and execution hatsppbrppstrongWhat your responsibilities will be strongpulliFullstack development with a focus on backendliliWrite understandable testable code with a focus on maintainability and scalabilityliliCollaborate with a remote development team review code test features and champion bugfree releasesliliHave control over infrastructure core emphasis on CI and data integrity and general sense of ownership on techliliPromote constant refactoring while developing features or touching existing code to keep the codebase as clean as possibleliliPromote iterative development using best practices such as feature toggles test automation and monitoring in order to ensure confidence in our release processliliActive engagement in technical discussions during architecture meetings code reviews and productdesign meetings to help promote a culture of learning and continuous improvementliliAbility to identify tradeoffs challenge ideas overcommunicate and effectively collaborate with teammatesliliBecome a domain expert working closely with our product team and stakeholdersliliHelp scale and monitor our services AWSliulpbrppstrongWho were looking for strongpulli35 years of software development experienceliliMust have experience working with a remote development teamliliExperience with Nodejs MongoDB and AWSliliExperience with at least 2 of the following languagesframeworks Typescript React Angular Swift andor KotlinliliPassion for technology innovation continued learning and above all driving value for our end usersliliStrong understanding of agile lean and DevOps principlesliliStrong understanding of testing and ability to bring ideas to improve QA standardsliliComfortable working in high growth fastpaced environments and can easily adapt to changeliliStrong understanding of industry best practices and standardsliliComfortable working with an offshore team communicating and collaborating across timezonesliliIncredible attention to detail and dedication to qualitylilistrongemBonusemstrong Experience with python data pipelines ML technologies or processing data into a form suitable for analysis and reportinglilistrongemPro tipemstrong youve done your research on Wellory before your first interviewliulpbrppstrongWhy you might be excited about us strongpulliWere emreallyem changing peoples lives and helping them live healthier happier longer Were doing important work that helps people create behavior change  and that excites you dailyliliYoure hungry to make REAL impact every single day  youre motivated by progress and know that the work you do will move the needleliliYoure excited to be one of the first ten employees of a startup  you see the path forward and youre eager to be a part of the journeyliliYou are a teamplayer who is able to thrive in ambiguity You love tackling new projects and building the playbook from scratch This is not the kind of job where you show up and we tell you exactly what to do every day micromanagement makes you cringeliulpbrppstrongWhy you might emnotem be excited about us strongpulliWere a lean mean fighting machine under 10 employees If you like a more established company setting this role isnt for youliliWere a remotefirst company and therefore fantastic communication skills verbal and written is vital If you dont like to overcommunicate you wont be happy hereliliWere an earlystage startup Projects and priorities are likely to shift If youre not keen on flexibility and a learn while we go mentality you may get frustrated easilyliliEveryone on the team is extremely missiondriven and works incredibly hard to push towards our lofty vision If you prefer a 95 job or to restandvest this job isnt for youliliAs the very first inhouse engineer youll be an owner and an operator If that doesnt excite you then were not a good matchliliWe deeply believe teamwork makes the dream work If youre not willing to lend a hand wherever its needed and sometimes that means it may be outside of your job description you wont fit inliulpbrppstrongLife as a Weep strongpulliemAll Wellory team members are referred to as WeepsemliliWFH Office set up   youll get a new computer  equipment to work comfortably while remoteliliFull health insurance coverage including dental and visionliliUnlimited vaca  we mean it liliMonthly team events  were a team that loves to celebrate and spend quality time together While we may be remote we plan monthly fun zoomstyle happy hours team bonding events virtual comedy shows moreliulpbrppstrongThe interview process strongppWell do our best to respond to all applications as quickly as possiblepollistrongFirst Call strong If its a match well invite you to chat with our CEO  Founder Emily on a 1hour call to learn more about the company and so we can learn more about youlilistrongSecond Callstrong  If we all get along youll move to a second call with our CPO  CoFounder Jeni to dive into the role and learn more about our products and tech teamlilistrongTakehome Assessment strong Next youll be given a takehome assignment to help us understand how you think work and communicate We value hard work first and foremostlilistrongMeet Our Advisorstrong  Then youll chat with our technical advisor Jason to dive into technical experience and development at WellorylilistrongFinal Chat strong Youll have one final interview with Jeni to recap learnings and answer any outstanding questionslilistrongReferencesstrong  Last step well reach out to people who youve worked with and hear what its like working alongside youliol
